questions.question: Which of the following is a non-primitive data type in C? / निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा C में गैर-प्राथमिक (non-primitive) डेटा टाइप है?
questions.explanation: Arrays are derived (non-primitive) data types, while int, char, and float are primitive.

questions.question: In DBMS, which normal form removes partial dependency? / DBMS में कौन सा सामान्य रूप (Normal Form) आंशिक निर्भरता (Partial Dependency) को हटाता है?
questions.explanation: Second Normal Form (2NF) removes partial dependency.

questions.question: Which scheduling algorithm may cause starvation? / कौन सा शेड्यूलिंग एल्गोरिथ्म starvation (भूखमरी) का कारण बन सकता है?
questions.explanation: In Priority Scheduling, low-priority processes may wait indefinitely, leading to starvation.

questions.question: Which protocol is used for secure communication over the internet? / इंटरनेट पर सुरक्षित संचार के लिए कौन सा प्रोटोकॉल उपयोग किया जाता है?
questions.explanation: SSH (Secure Shell) provides secure encrypted communication.

questions.question: If A is the father of B, and B is the father of C, what is the relation of A to C? / यदि A, B का पिता है और B, C का पिता है, तो A का C से क्या संबंध है?
questions.explanation: A is the father of B, and B is the father of C → A is the grandfather of C.

questions.question: Find the next term in the series: 2, 4, 8, 16, ? / श्रृंखला का अगला पद ज्ञात कीजिए: 2, 4, 8, 16, ?
questions.explanation: Each term is multiplied by 2. So, 16 × 2 = 32.

questions.question: The average of first 10 natural numbers is: / पहले 10 प्राकृतिक संख्याओं का औसत क्या है?
Who is known as the father of Computer Science? / कंप्यूटर विज्ञान के जनक के रूप में किसे जाना जाता है?
questions.explanation: Alan Turing is regarded as the father of Computer Science. Charles Babbage is called the father of Computers.

questions.question: The 'Nalanda University' was a famous centre of learning in which state? / 'नालंदा विश्वविद्यालय' किस राज्य में एक प्रसिद्ध शिक्षा केंद्र था?
questions.explanation: Nalanda University, one of the oldest universities, is located in Bihar.
